title: Witcher 3 Next-Gen Delayed - Kinda Funny Games Daily 04.14.22
description:
Janet and Tim breakdown the latest CD Projekt Red delay, Fez's 10th anniversary, Niantic's new AR game, and more!

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:04:00 - Housekeeping
There’s a new Kinda Funny Podcast up right now and it’s a farewell and remembrance of Portillo. You can watch that right now on Youtube.com/kindafunny and on podcast services around the globe.
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: FargoBrady, Pranksy, & Anonymous
The Roper Report  -
00:04:50 - Witcher 3’s Next Gen Delay - Amelia Zollner @ IGN https://www.ign.com/articles/witcher-3-next-gen-delayed-again-ps5-xbox-series-x
00:16:56 - Pokémon Go developer Niantic is making an AR pet game called Peridot - Andrew Webster @ The Verge https://www.theverge.com/2022/4/13/23021722/peridot-niantic-ar-pet-game-iphone-android-pokemon-go
00:25:00 - Why Pedro Pascal hasn’t finished TLOU - Logan Plant @ IGN
https://www.ign.com/articles/pedro-pascal-last-of-us-hbo-mandalorian-dave-filoni
00:37:25 - Ad
00:39:20 - No Man's Sky creator says next game is "pretty ambitious" - Ishraq Subhan https://www.eurogamer.net/no-mans-sky-creator-says-next-game-is-pretty-ambitious
00:48:47 - Fez at 10 years old: Phil Fish resurfaces for a rare interview https://www.eurogamer.net/fez-at-10-years-old-phil-fish-resurfaces-for-a-rare-interview
00:55:50 - Out today
00:59:30 - Reader Mail - Success story! - The Nano Biologist
01:01:15 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts:Bless and Tim
itunes:author: Kinda Funny

content:encoded:
Janet and Tim breakdown the latest CD Projekt Red delay, Fez's 10th anniversary, Niantic's new AR game, and more!


Time Stamps -

00:00:00 - Start

00:04:00 - Housekeeping

There’s a new Kinda Funny Podcast up right now and it’s a farewell and remembrance of Portillo. You can watch that right now on Youtube.com/kindafunny and on podcast services around the globe.

Thank you to our Patreon Producers: FargoBrady, Pranksy, & Anonymous

The Roper Report  -

00:04:50 - Witcher 3’s Next Gen Delay - Amelia Zollner @ IGN https://www.ign.com/articles/witcher-3-next-gen-delayed-again-ps5-xbox-series-x

00:16:56 - Pokémon Go developer Niantic is making an AR pet game called Peridot - Andrew Webster @ The Verge https://www.theverge.com/2022/4/13/23021722/peridot-niantic-ar-pet-game-iphone-android-pokemon-go

00:25:00 - Why Pedro Pascal hasn’t finished TLOU - Logan Plant @ IGN

https://www.ign.com/articles/pedro-pascal-last-of-us-hbo-mandalorian-dave-filoni

00:37:25 - Ad

00:39:20 - No Man's Sky creator says next game is "pretty ambitious" - Ishraq Subhan https://www.eurogamer.net/no-mans-sky-creator-says-next-game-is-pretty-ambitious

00:48:47 - Fez at 10 years old: Phil Fish resurfaces for a rare interview https://www.eurogamer.net/fez-at-10-years-old-phil-fish-resurfaces-for-a-rare-interview

00:55:50 - Out today
